content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is James Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Good day, Mr. Smith. Thank you for your interest in renting my apartment. I believe we can come to an agreement on the rental price. May I ask what budget you have in mind for this rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest possible price. What do you propose?
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: I understand that you are looking for the lowest possible price. However, as a landlord, I want to ensure that I am getting a fair market value for my property. With that said, I am willing to negotiate with you to find a mutually beneficial rental price. May I suggest a monthly rental price of 800 Euros? This price is based on the current market rates for similar apartments in the area and takes into account the size and location of my property.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 800 Euros per month.
TERMINATE
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for your acceptance of the rental price of 800 Euros per month. I am glad that we were able to come to an agreement. If you have any questions or concerns regarding the rental process, please do not hesitate to reach out to me.
name: Heinrich Heine
